title: Coveiten
description: Tyrell Collins has everything he wants; a good job, a large inheritance and his Collection. Until he meets Lehana Kerr and unknowingly adds a human being to his list of belongings. Lehana Kerr just wants to get through the day, which is no easy feat when you're being haunted by your dead twin brother, who wants you to follow him into the afterlife. He's even a little tempted, until he meets Tyrell Collins and realises there is something to covet in life after all.
author: Taevas Noir
